DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find meal timing affect calorie burn blood sugar level .
DOC.brief_title: Does Meal Timing Affect Energy Expenditure
DOC.detailed_description: 10 overweight adult men woman eat accord two different eat schedule : graze time-restricting feeding ( `` early eat '' ) . While eat schedule , metabolism ( calorie burn ) measure 24-hour stay respiratory chamber . Glucose levels—as well key diurnal rhythm heart rate—will also measure continuously . This study require two 1-week period participation .
DOC.criteria: Are 2045 year age Have weight 150 220 lb Have body mass index 25 35 kg/m2 inclusive ( number calculate height weight ) If female , regular menstrual cycle 25 35 day long If female , period within last 35 day Regularly go sleep 9:30 pm 12:00 Regularly eat dinner 9 hour eat breakfast Are willing 2/3 cup blood store future research relate study Have diabetes antidiabetes medication Suffer significant cardiovascular , renal ( kidney ) , cardiac ( heart ) , liver , lung nervous system disease Have stomach intestinal problem Regularly use medication steroid , beta blocker , adrenergicstimulating agent , laxative Take medication supplement know affect sleep , circadian rhythm , metabolism ( exception certain form birth control allow ) Have abnormal lab work clinically significant opinion study physician Are pregnant lactate Take Depo Provera shot , use Interuterine Device ( IUD ) hormone patch birth control If hormonal birth control , stable dose less 3 month Have smoke use nicotine/tobacco product within last 3 month Regularly competitive sport training Perform overnight shift work average one time per week Have irregular sleep schedule Have irregular eating schedule Regularly drink 3 drink alcohol per day Are able unwilling eat food drink serve Pennington Biomedical , study Are able unwilling refrain strenuous exercise participating study Are able spend 2 separate full day ( 25 hour ) Pennington Biomedical Are able maintain consistent sleep schedule participate study Are able maintain consistent eating schedule participate study Are able stop drinking coffee caffeinecontaining drink day day prior test
